doc.title: Himmler et moi
doc.plot: I discovered a wad of photocopies in my father's attic. Nothing to fuss about except that those photocopies are private documents belonging to Himmler and his daughter Unpublished documents of which I could not even request the origin from my father since he had died. That's how I started an investigation. Looking for original documents from the Himmler family, looking for Nazis, looking for the meaning of Shoa... looking for my father.
